reviews.review:
Lot's of things need to change in this game before its good again.

Matchmaking and ranks need a complete overhaul. 
There needs to be a WAY better anti-cheat system other than VAC and Overwatch cases. 
Servers need to be upgraded to 128 tick.
Gaben needs to give me more knives out of cases.
Servers need better connection, I shouldn't feel laggy with 10 ping.
Scammers also need to be taken care.
В ТОМ ЧТО ТУТ НА ПРАЙМАХ ПРАВДА МАЛО ЧИТАКОВ

Pretty good point and click adventure game
Too many hackers playing the game even if they get banned they just buy a new account. It should be better then this. This is the same game of my childhood so i want it to be better
